Package controllers

Class MainController

java.lang.Object
controllers.MainController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MainController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Main controller for the main screen. Includes searching for part and Product and adding, removing, modifying buttons for Parts and Products

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      initializes controller. Generates both product and part table
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - this is the fxml url
      resourceBundle - this is main bundle.

    • addPart

      void addPart​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event) throws java.io.IOException
      Add new part and opens add part scene
      Parameters:
      event - This is on the button click. The add part scene will open
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - this throws an exception on load

    • addProduct

      void addProduct​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event) throws java.io.IOException
      Opens add product scene
      Parameters:
      event - On click opens the add product scene
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - throws when scene doesnt open

    • deletePart

      void deletePart​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Deletes part and given confirmation. When user clicks yes on confirm. The part is deleted and table is updated
      Parameters:
      event - on click, delete the part

    • deleteProduct

      void deleteProduct​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Deletes product and gives user the confirmation. On confirm, the table is updated
      Parameters:
      event - Button pressed

    • exitScreen

      void exitScreen​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Exits the program
      Parameters:
      event - on click exit the program.

    • modifyPart

      void modifyPart​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event) throws java.io.IOException
      Opens the modify part scene.
      Parameters:
      event - button to open the scene
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - this is thrown when the part cannot be saved or the fields entered are not valid.
      java.io.IOException

    • modifyProduct

      void modifyProduct​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event) throws java.io.IOException
      Open modify product scene
      Parameters:
      event - opens scene
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - when the product cannot be modified.
      java.io.IOException

    • searchPart

      void searchPart​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Searches for part when button is pressed. This function finds part by ID when the user enters a number and searches by name when string is entered. Searches by partial names.
      Parameters:
      event - searches when the button is pressed and updates table.

    • searchProduct

      void searchProduct​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Searches for Product when button is pressed. This function finds product by ID when the user enters a number and searches by name when string is entered.
      Parameters:
      event - searches when the button is pressed and updates table.

    • isNumeric

      public static boolean isNumeric​(java.lang.String str)
      Checks if the string entered in the search bar is a number. if its a number the function searches for part ID. This function could extend functionality when you update the program. This is needed to complete the program. This function is needed to determine if the user inputs a number or a string to search. without this function, you wouldnt be able to search for the right thing
      Parameters:
      str - string to check if its a number
      Returns:
      boolean.
